sourcesContent:
Highscore List

Place Name Weighted Points Score Time Start Game End Game Duration Quiz Choosen Category Actions
{{ i + 1 }} {{ score.spieler }} {{ weightedPoints(score) }} {{ score.punktzahl }} {{ score.start }} {{ score.ende }} {{ durationQuiz(score) }} {{ score.kategorien_id }}
# {{weightedPoints(newRow)}} {{durationQuiz(newRow)}}
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; // Import OnInit import { HttpClient } from '@angular/common/http'; import { Router } from '@angular/router'; @Component({ selector: 'app-category-highscore-page', templateUrl: './category-highscore-page.component.html', styleUrls: ['./category-highscore-page.component.css'] }) export class CategoryHighscorePageComponent implements OnInit { // Implement OnInit highscore!: Array; newRow: any = {}; constructor(private http: HttpClient, private router: Router) { } ngOnInit() { const url = 'http://localhost:5002/spiele'; this.http.get>(url).subscribe((response) => { // Specify the type of the response as Array this.highscore = response; }); } addNewRow() { this.newRow = { editing: true }; this.highscore.push(this.newRow); } submitNewScore(score: any) { if (score.spieler && score.gewichtete_punkte && score.punkte && score.spielzeit && score.start && score.kategorien_id) { const url = 'http://localhost:5002/spiele'; this.http.post(url, score).subscribe(() => { this.newRow = {}; score.editing = false; }); } } durationQuiz(score: any): number { const start = new Date(score.start); const end = new Date(score.ende); const duration = (end.getTime() - start.getTime()) / 1000; return duration; } weightedPoints(score: any): number { const duration = this.durationQuiz(score); const weightedPoints = score.punktzahl / duration; return weightedPoints; } }
